backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing artworks with create, read, list, and delete functions plus user-based access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with Home, Gallery, and Studio routes wrapped in AppLayout.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/effects/Confetti: Fullscreen canvas overlay rendering animated confetti pieces.
frontend/src/components/gallery/HeroTile: Hero tile displaying hero image with error fallback, lock state, and styled hover effects.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with fixed auth button, routed content, and a styled footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/premium/UnlockHe: Dialog that lets users unlock a hero by watching an ad, tracks watch progress, and triggers unlock callbacks.
frontend/src/components/saves/MySavesDia: Displays the user's saved artworks with options to download or delete, requiring sign‑in for access.
frontend/src/components/studio/BrushCont: Provides brush size adjustment, eraser toggle, and clear actions for the drawing tool.
frontend/src/components/studio/ColorPale: Renders a selectable color palette and notifies when a new color is chosen.
frontend/src/components/studio/DrawingSu: Canvas drawing component that loads a template image, tracks strokes, and supports clearing and exporting.
frontend/src/components/studio/FinishSav: Button that exports the drawing and either saves it to the backend or downloads it locally, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Provides CRUD helpers for artworks using underlying query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePremiumUnlocks.ts: Manages premium hero unlocks using localStorage and clears them when the user logs out, exposing helpers to check and unlock heroes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating artwork data, including listing, retrieving, creating, and deleting artworks.
frontend/src/hooks/useVibration.ts: Provides a simple hook to trigger predefined vibration patterns using the Web Vibration API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom theme variables, hero-related colors, and various utility classes for styling the UI.
frontend/src/lib/heroes.ts: Exports a list of hero definitions with IDs, names, template paths, and premium status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays the hero selection grid, handles premium unlock flow, navigation, and shows user save dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with animated branding and a button navigating to the gallery to start painting.
frontend/src/pages/StudioPage.tsx: React page that renders the coloring studio with drawing surface, color/brush controls, eraser, confetti, and hero-specific template handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL or hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, layout, animations, and enabling several plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s state, features, issues, required assets, and architectural notes.
